definition: to appear before one's eyes/to come into view/to float into appearance/to come back (of images from the past)/to emerge/it emerges/it occurs (to me that..)

sentences.english: You’ll see what goals keep surfacing and what goals vanish.
sentences.chinese: 你會看到哪些目標不斷浮現而哪些逐漸消失。

sentences.english: This emerging awakening is a blessing from Source of All.
sentences.chinese: 這一浮現的覺醒是萬有之源的一份祝福。

sentences.english: My mind traveled over the happy days of my boyhood .
sentences.chinese: 我的心裏歷歷浮現出少年時代那些快樂的事。

sentences.english: Jot down the first twenty ideas that come to mind.
sentences.chinese: 抄下心中浮現的前20個主意。

sentences.english: Another passage from The Seven-Pointed Star came back to him.
sentences.chinese: 又一段七點星的章節浮現與他腦海。

sentences.english: The pleasant old days often recurred to me.
sentences.chinese: 往日的歡樂景象常常浮現在我的腦海。

sentences.english: She found the house hpublishing makeen destroyed by the storm.
sentences.chinese: 她浮現房子仍然被暴風雨摧毀。

sentences.english: A close your eyes, it will emerge at home and that the old pot mouth.
sentences.chinese: 一閉上眼睛，便會浮現家中那口古老的鍋。

sentences.english: Both are a pattern that emerges from a jumble of interconnected parts.
sentences.chinese: 兩者都是從一大堆互相連接的部件中浮現出來的模式。

sentences.english: Idle thoughts floated through his mind.
sentences.chinese: 莫名其妙地想法浮現在他心頭。

sentences.english: Give a pleasant smile of a woman, right cheek dimples.
sentences.chinese: 嫣然一笑，右頰有酒窩浮現。

sentences.english: Many things of the past reappeared in his memory.
sentences.chinese: 以往的事重新浮現在他的腦海裏。

sentences.english: The childhood dreams, which I assumed had gone with the wind, reappeared in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 本以爲早已隨風飄逝的年少時的夢境再次浮現。

sentences.english: Hydrogen embrittlement can become important in martensitic steels.
sentences.chinese: 馬氏體鋼容易浮現氫脆現象。

sentences.english: The past events were running again in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 往事又浮現在我的腦海中。

sentences.english: Then occasionally - sometimes unexpectedly - a world of tradition and spirituality resurfaces.
sentences.chinese: 然而有時突然間，一個傳統和精神的世界重新浮現。

definition: to appear/to arise/to emerge/to show up
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
to accompany/to follow/to occur together with/concomitant
to sense/to perceive/to become aware of/to detect

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
